channel.title: Hasna Hena Mow
channel.description: Web Developer from Bangladesh writes about her jouney in tech industry. Here you can find her story becoming Mozilla intern by Outreachy, a remote paid intership program

item.title: How I got my internship at Mozilla through Outreachy
item.description: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.
item.dc:creator: Hasna Hena Mow
